snippet: Ken Austin is the founder and chairman of Avión Tequila, a maker of the beverage. He has loved flying since he was a child growing up near Kennedy Airport, and named his company for it.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Avion Tequila chairman Ken Austin discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Ken Austin is the founder and chairman of Avión Tequila, a maker of the beverage. He has loved flying since he was a child growing up near Kennedy Airport, and named his company for it.

headline.seo: Met by Coyotes on the Runway
headline.main: The Law on Board, and Coyotes on the Runway
headline.print_headline: The Law on Board, and Coyotes on the Runway
